name: Torun
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_defends}, this relic afflicts a random enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED}.
While the bearer is {ACTION_defending}, it cannot lose stats.
When an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED} would gain stats, it has a 50% chance to lose stats instead.
At the end of the bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED}.
Enemies' {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED} debuffs have an independent 20% chance to activate.
While the bearer is {ACTION_defending}, enemies' {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED} debuffs have a 50% greater chance to activate.
When an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED} would be healed, it has a 50% chance to take damage instead.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks} an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED}, the enemy {ACTION_attacks} itself.
While the bearer is {ACTION_defending}, it has a 10% chance to avoid damage.
Enemies have a 10% chance to {ACTION_attack} and {ACTION_cast} spells as if they have {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED} even if they don't have this debuff.
title: God of the Sea
